ud3.6:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
ud3.6:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma pilindavaccho bhikkhu vasalavadena samudacarati.
ud3.6:1.4: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
ud3.6:2.1: Atha kho bhagava annataram bhikkhum amantesi:
ud3.6:2.2: “ehi tvam, bhikkhu, mama vacanena pilindavaccham bhikkhum amantehi:
ud3.6:2.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato patissutva yenayasma pilindavaccho tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam pilindavaccham etadavoca:
ud3.6:3.1: “Evamavuso”ti kho ayasma pilindavaccho tassa bhikkhuno patissutva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam pilindavaccham bhagava etadavoca:
ud3.6:3.2: “saccam kira tvam, vaccha, bhikkhu vasalavadena samudacarasi”ti?
ud3.6:4.1: Atha kho bhagava ayasmato pilindavacchassa pubbenivasam manasi karitva bhikkhu amantesi:
ud3.6:4.2: “ma kho tumhe, bhikkhave, vacchassa bhikkhuno ujjhayittha.
ud3.6:4.3: Na, bhikkhave, vaccho dosantaro bhikkhu vasalavadena samudacarati.
ud3.6:4.4: Vacchassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno panca jatisatani abbokinnani brahmanakule paccajatani.
ud3.6:5.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
ud3.6:6.4: So brahmano so samano sa bhikkhu”ti.
